author: Sam Warner
title: Coronation Street's Jack P Shepherd goes undercover to ask public about live episode - Coronation Street Soaps -
text: Be careful who you talk to in the street - they might not be who you expect.Coronation Street's Jack P Shepherd - aka David Platt - disguised himself as a reporter to ask members of the public what they thought of last Wednesday's (September 23) live episode.Specifically, Shepherd asked the blissfully unaware people of Manchester whether they preferred his performance as Platt or Sean Ward's performance as Callum Logan.Most people went for Ward, much to the chagrin of Shepherd.He also asked them who their favourite character was - with not much love for David. Â© ITV After all, it was Ward's performance that grabbed most of the headlines after he was killed off in dramatic fashion in the hour-long live episode.Callum was killed by Kylie Platt in the episode, with the Platt family now desperately trying to cover their tracks.Coronation Street continues on Monday on ITV at 7.30pm.Coronation Street reveals story of live episode in this behind-the-scenes videoHere's how Twitter reacted to Callum Logan's death in Coronation Street liveDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ian and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Sally Webster's Coronation Street wedding shocker, a horror accident in Emmerdale and a fire drama for one Hollyoaks family. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
